description:
What is it: Defines the default Windows Update configuration for Intune managed devices. Applies to all corporate devices except those in the Insiders or Preview update rings. 
 Simeon Notes: This is the catch all Windows Update Ring that includes all devices not included in other rings. Simeonâ€™s baseline delays feature updates for 30 days and quality updates for 14 days after released by Microsoft. Once the deferral period has expired for the device, users have 3 days to restart (if required). Also, unattended updates are only be applied outside the working hours of 5am to 10pm. 
 Learn More: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/windows-it-pro-blog/tactical-considerations-for-creating-windows-deployment-rings/ba-p/746979
